attributes.action: cut the price of fuel or do away with the road tax system. if it carries on much longer then you will be putting people out of work as soon we wont be able to afford transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if it carries on much longer then you will be putting people out of work as soon we wont be able to afford transport
we are now at £5 a gallon.  £10 worth of petrol allows you to travel 55 miles.
it doesnt matter about the year of the car the tax should come down if theemmissions are lower. so what gives you the right to say my 1999 car is worst than a 2001 car.   i think the whole of britain should   all hand back the tax disc to you on a set date. every body in the whole of england.  we want to be able to earn and spend on our children.  not lining your pockets with tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
